original_title: Jagath Priyankara sworn in as MP to fill Sanath Nishantha’s vacancy
original_body_lines: Parliament, Feb. 08 (Daily Mirror)- Jagath Priyankara was sworn in as a Member of Parliament before Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardane a short while ago.
He was sworn in as a MP to fill the vacancy created by the sudden death of State Minister Sanath Nishantha.
